titleInfo.title: ‘PLAN OF THE PENINSULA OR CAPE OF ADEN Exhibiting the Proposed Military Limits. Aden July 1855’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Coloured lithographDimensions:826 x 1227 mm, on sheet 892 x 1275 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Copied & Lithographed in the Office of the Chief Engineer at the Presidency, Bombay 27th December 1862. Signed by R. Phayre Lieutenant-Colonel Quarter Master General.Distinctive Features:Plan of the Aden peninsula shows the military site and existing town with public buildings including Town Bazar, Grass Market, Mosques, Civil Hospital and Small Pox Hospital, Old Jail (military site) and New Jail (town site) labelled. Proposed Military Limits indicated by pecked line and coloured in red. Also shows a proposed site of Town near Steamer Point in Western Bay.
